name: Changes the font for YouTube and makes it more tou
description:
The main objective was to change the font.  However, I was also having troubles using a touch screen as some elements were hidden until the mouse hovered overhead and some items were too small.  Both the main site and the YouTube Studio are effected.

Note: If you want the Feedback dialog included, you'll need to add a GreaseMonkey script.  I created one that works.  It's available at https://gist.github.com/WillPittenger/3fe35c23948f400c179516bdb6e66417 , but you'll need to find and replace the font name.  You can also find the script at https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/413667-change-font-for-youtube .  Note that the script requires JavaScript 8 or newer.
additional_info:
version 1.0.3

Newest version prevents the history page from hiding elements.
